name: sss
description:
# AI Agent Builder Prompt

## Core Purpose
I need an AI agent that can [main function]. It should help users [primary benefit].

## Key Capabilities
- Process and understand [type of input]
- Generate [type of output]
- Handle [specific scenario]

## Personality
- Communication style: [formal/friendly/technical]
- Response length: [concise/detailed]
- Special traits: [helpful/creative/analytical]

## Example Interaction
User: "[typical user request]"
Agent: "[ideal response]"

## Limitations
The agent should acknowledge when it can't [limitation].

## Success Metrics
I'll know this agent works well when it consistently [measurable outcome].

capabilities.name: Conversational Response
capabilities.description: Generate contextually appropriate and helpful responses
